title: This is not ok!

embed.description: Definitely not ok. Skip to the last third of the video i don't want to edit it

replies.body:
Couldn't dodge taric's Stun and yet blames taric for being OP.
OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOK.
I'm the taric I was complaining about the victor just standing there the whole time ignoring pings I think you misunderstood.

Yea that wasnt clear. I thought the same thing. Confused why you were QQ.

Atleast you got 2 kills out of it. Victors loss. Let the bads stay in their rank.
Yeah nah blatantly ignoring pings is aids and we straight lost the game because the Darius got the shutdown then stomped the victor. That game broke my spine.

Also you can't realy evade taric stun with no boots it's too easy for me to react and just follow you because you are slower even if I'm slower too think of it as having a wider aoe the slower you move. Because it takes longer for you to leave its radius that is.
